comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Patrick was a shady lawyer who was convicted of murder and sentenced to death. Questions about the evidence eventually led to his pardon by the Governor: law.jrank.org/pages/2737/Albert-Patrick-Trial-1902.html NY Times article about the trial: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E7DD103EE333A... NY Times article about his appealing the verdict: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A0DE5D91230E733A...

comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_T._Patrick
